thread.title: Joy Behar Straight Up Refers To Donald Trump As A 'Dictator' On The View, No One Bats An Eye!
thread.title_full: Joy Behar Straight Up Refers To Donald Trump As A 'Dictator' On The View, No One Bats An Eye! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Joy Behar Straight Up Refers To Donald Trump As A 'Dictator' On The View, No One Bats An Eye!
text:
We'd say something like, "Damn, Joy Behar ," but… what's the point?
In The View 's Monday roundtable about Saturday Night Live 's satirization of Donald Trump this weekend, the cohost said:
"I think that the comedy is subversive, and there's nothing that a dictator hates more than being made fun of."
She then goes on to imagine how Hitler would have reacted to Mel Brooks ' spoof The Producers . Now, it's not unusual for someone to make a bold comparison on the show, but here's the thing:
NO ONE SAYS ANYTHING!
Related: The Awkward 11 Tweets Trump Wrote About Kristen Stewart 
No one laughs, no one gives a "Well, hold on…" Not even token conservative Jedediah Bila takes issue with the wording.
At this point, it's no longer an exaggeration. Trump is a dictator. America has a dictator.
Ch-ch-check out the upsetting segment (below)! 

[ Image via ABC . ] 
Tags: donald trump , joy behar , politik , saturday night live , the view , tv news
